snippet: According to a poll conducted by Quinnipiac University, only 32 percent of likely Democratic voters said they favored Ms. Quinn in the Democratic primary, compared with 37 percent six weeks ago.
abstract: According to a poll conducted by Quinnipiac University, only 32 percent of likely Democratic voters said they favored Ms. Quinn in the Democratic primary, compared with 37 percent six weeks ago.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

headline.main: Quinn Loses Popularity, but Retains Lead in Mayoral Race, Poll Finds
headline.print_headline: Quinn Loses Popularity but Retains Lead in ’13 Campaign, Poll Finds
